column2:
, ")
    email = fake.email()
    createdAt = fake.date_between(start_date='-1y', end_date='today')
    updatedAt = fake.date_between(start_date=createdAt, end_date='today')
    return [id, name, email, createdAt, updatedAt]

with open('dummy_data.csv', 'w', newline='') as file:
    writer = csv.writer(file)
    writer.writerow(header)
    for _ in range(100):
        data = generate_data()
        writer.writerow(data)
